message.body: Heya! Been a while!
Busy meditating. Later
at later in day, or eve?
In Natick. Unveiled Rene's stone ydy; her dearest Framingham friends & mine were there. Now going to head off w daughter & sister to Mus of Science. Ch
Either is good
Great. It'll depend on how things develop. Later, then!
Heh. turns out that this is a good time 4 me, as my daughter is gonna shower b4 we head to the museum. So, how ya doing?
Doing mostly okay. Going to see a cardiologist for the first time on Weds. A bit scared, but hanging in
Routine? Or symptoms of concern?
Symptoms - heart murmur harsher than normal, ankles swelling again
Glad you're seeing the doc!
Misheberach...
Seemed like the thing to do
Abso-effin'-lutely. Insurance covers it, yes?
Medicaid
Good. I'll be retiring 11/1 and am planning benefits
Make sure you do. I got screwed by my union on that
., maybe sooner, yeah! Call 'em from this phone.
I just heard from a Co-worker about problems/delays getting an appt w HR, so gonna put in my calendar to start setting that up as soon as I get home. ..
Oh, @#%~~ยก
Yeah-that's how I ended up so sick last year - no insurance
clerotic and bureaucratic.
Unions were/are supposed to be there 4 the workers' benefit, but like so many other groups, as they get older, bigger, & more complex they tend to get s
Oy Gottenyu.
But u have medicaid now. Any other sources?
Yep
(I have no union but HR here is pretty good, knock on wood)
Medicare? Private ins?
Nope. But the Medicaid seems to be okay for everything but the dental
For that, they'd rather pull teeth than save them
Hmm, reviewing the last couple of things I said about HR, they look inconsistent. All the more reason I should call 'em sooner,
Too young for Medicare; can't afford private
Bleah . Any public-oriented clinics in reach?
Ah.
Although I might have something that looks like part of an income this year
So mote it be! Like what?
Not for dental for me - hair-trigger gag reflex
And small interior jaw, so getting x-rays is hellish
I'm missing something here, maybe bco the intermittent pacing of chat. I was asking about the possible income.
The dentist they assigned me is good with the X-rays, but won't do any work until I have some periodontal stuff, which Medicaid won't cover
You had also asked about clinics
The income is from the web content stuff & proof reading I've been doing
Right. Got it. ... Ah! That's a positive!
How do you find the proofreading work?
Bc I'm srsly considering that post-retirement as a $ource
I got lucky. Someone referred me to a small press
Ah. Thass nice :-) But as you say, luck, not what I can count on our look for.
Oo hah yeah!
I gotta remember to make a note of that after we sign off and b4 heading out to the museum.
Noted:-)
Told him you'd be emailing him about it
